wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Thomas Nash (born 1942) is a British diplomat. He was Chargé d'Affaires to Albania from 1993 to 1995, Ambassador to Georgia from 1995 to 1998, Ambassador to Albania from 1998 to 1999, and Ambassador to Latvia from 1999 to 2002.

response: *Stephen Nash (rugby league) (born 1986), English rugby league footballer
*Stephen Nash (diplomat) (born 1942), former British Ambassador to Albania, Georgia and Latvia
